name: Legend of Mau
description:
Gameplay
  • Command Esther & Sebastian in a series of procedurally generated battles against the army of Rats.
  • Hover over characters to view their stats.
  • Channel your abilities and select enemy units to cast them on.
  • Strategically position your characters based on their strengths and weaknesses.
Controls
  • Mouse to select characters, ground & UI elements.
  • Number keys to activate character skills.
  • Spacebar to end your turn.
  • Scroll to zoom in and out.
Character Abilities Esther (+2 mana / turn) NumberNameDamageEnergy CostMana Cost1Magebolt2202Firebolt1025 Sebastian NumberNameDamageEnergy CostMana Cost1Slash420
Procedural Features
  • Infinite Levels
  • Grid size is randomised per level
  • Rock placement and model is randomised per level
  • Character placement is randomised per level
  • Enemy type & placement is randomised per level
  • Vocalisations are randomly selected from a pool of audio clips
